          Gostei
        </span>

<div aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember306" tabindex="-1"><!-- --></div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember307" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember308" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember309"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Every year, thousands of developers of free and open source <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6763614692389748736">#software</a> from all over the world gather at Brussels. <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=fosdem&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6763614692389748736">#FOSDEM</a> 2021 will take place Online this weekend. (February 6 &amp; 7) Check it out: <a data-attribute-index="4" href="http://ow.ly/kDRZ50DsVPf">http://ow.ly/kDRZ50DsVPf</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=free&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6763614692389748736">#Free</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=techevent&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6763614692389748736">#TechEvent</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-379="379" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember361" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember362" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember363"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">The edge computing market is projected to grow by a CAGR of 19.9% between now and 2025. The direction in companies now is to move more processing or at least pre-processing to the edge. <a data-attribute-index="3" href="http://ow.ly/9qCC50Dw1Rd">http://ow.ly/9qCC50Dw1Rd</a> <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=iot&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6765032779953516544">#IoT</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=5g&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6765032779953516544">#5g</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=technews&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6765032779953516544">#TechNews</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<h2 class="feed-shared-article__title break-words t-14 t-bold t-black">
<span dir="ltr">With 5G, edge computing and IoT will surge: Now's the time to upgrade your edge | ZDNet</span>

<div class="artdeco-button__text align-items-center">
<li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" type="like-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="24x24" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">App development has become an integral part of <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=iot&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6767578349272342528">#IoT</a> device creation. It’s near impossible to find consumer connected devices that don’t come with a smartphone application. Learn more about different things to consider in IoT App <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=development&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6767578349272342528">#Development</a> here: <a data-attribute-index="2" href="http://ow.ly/XD5i50DBZV4">http://ow.ly/XD5i50DBZV4</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="feed-shared-actor__sub-description t-12 t-normal t-black--light">
<span><span aria-hidden="true">1 m • <li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="v-align-bottom" size="small" type="globe-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="16x16" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M8 1a7 7 0 107 7 7 7 0 00-7-7zM3 8a5 5 0 011-3l.55.55A1.5 1.5 0 015 6.62v1.07a.75.75 0 00.22.53l.56.56a.75.75 0 00.53.22H7v.69a.75.75 0 00.22.53l.56.56a.75.75 0 01.22.53V13a5 5 0 01-5-5zm6.24 4.83l2-2.46a.75.75 0 00.09-.8l-.58-1.16A.76.76 0 0010 8H7v-.19a.51.51 0 01.28-.45l.38-.19a.74.74 0 01.68 0L9 7.5l.38-.7a1 1 0 00.12-.48v-.85a.78.78 0 01.21-.53l1.07-1.09a5 5 0 01-1.54 9z"></path>
</svg></li-icon> </span><span class="visually-hidden">Há 1 mês</span></span>
</span>
</div>
</a>
<button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Visualizar mais sobre Dextra Technologies" class="entity-hovercard__a11y-trigger" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniCompany:21936" data-entity-hovercard-trigger="click" type="button"></button>
<button aria-label="Seguir" aria-pressed="false" class="follow ember-view feed-shared-actor__follow-button feed-shared-update-v2__follow-button artdeco-button feed-shared-update-v2__follow-button--next-to-control-menu artdeco-button--tertiary" data-control-name="actor_follow_toggle" id="ember451"> <li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" size="small" type="plus-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="16x16" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember456" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember457" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember458"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Data Privacy Day is a worldwide effort to create awareness about the importance of respecting privacy and safeguarding data. Here are some tips to protect yourself from cybercrime. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=dataprivacyday&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6760609946481561600">#DataPrivacyDay</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=privacyaware&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6760609946481561600">#PrivacyAware</a> More info: <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://lnkd.in/dKkH48a">https://lnkd.in/dKkH48a</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember488" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember489" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember490"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">On Feb. 11, the world celebrates the International Day of Women and Girls in Science to raise awareness among young girls about STEM disciplines.<br/><br/>This year, we say thank you to all <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=womeninscience&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6765660898175664128">#WomenInScience</a> who are on the frontlines of the global COVID-19 response. Meet some of them in this article by the UN: <a data-attribute-index="3" href="http://bit.ly/unwomenSTEM">http://bit.ly/unwomenSTEM</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=womeninstem&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6765660898175664128">#WomenInSTEM</a> <br/><br/>We also invite you to check out these free computer science activities: <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://lnkd.in/gPnKwRs">https://lnkd.in/gPnKwRs</a> Share this with your girlfriends/sisters/daughters to raise awareness among young girls about STEM disciplines. <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=codeathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6765660898175664128">#CodeAtHome</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-534="534" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">This year hasn’t been what any of us expected; but we've found new ways to stay connected. Thank you for your continued support, loyalty and generosity! All the best for 2021, we hope to see you all soon. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=dextralife&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6750548588570402816">#DextraLife</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=rewind2020&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6750548588570402816">#Rewind2020</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=throwbackthursday&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6750548588570402816">#ThrowbackThursday</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span><span dir="ltr">MBUX Hyperscreen looks like the future of automotive <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=infotainment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6753369748031062016">#infotainment</a> systems. <span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Global spending on <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=wearable&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6758529935482077184">#wearable</a> devices increased 18.1% in 2020. The rise in remote work and interest in health monitoring was a significant factor driving market growth. Take a look at the report: <a data-attribute-index="2" href="http://ow.ly/Npnh50Dg7gV">http://ow.ly/Npnh50Dg7gV</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=techtrends&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6758529935482077184">#TechTrends</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Hello, world! Today is the 256th day of the year: Happy Programmer’s Day to all our friends and colleagues! 🎉Big thanks to our teammates at Dextra Technologies, for their day-to-day work. Enjoy your weekend! <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=programmersday&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6710555145186365440">#ProgrammersDay</a></span></span>
</span>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember761" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember762" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember763"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Happy Tester’s Day! Shout out to all our QA Engineers <br/>and bug hunters out there! <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=testersday&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6709452929226571776">#TestersDay</a><br/><br/>Did you know? The very first instance of a computer "bug" was recorded on September 9, 1947. This "bug" was an actual real-life moth, so the first "computer bug" was, in fact, a literal bug.</span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember953" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember954" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember955"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Google has released today version 87 of its <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=chrome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6734616141483798529">#Chrome</a> browser, which comes with a security fix and a broader deprecation of the FTP protocol. Major new features are aimed at web developers, take a look: <a data-attribute-index="2" href="http://ow.ly/KN7E50CntlZ">http://ow.ly/KN7E50CntlZ</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=technews&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6734616141483798529">#TechNews</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<div class="feed-shared-social-actions feed-shared-social-action-bar social-detail-base-social-actions feed-shared-social-action-bar--has-social-counts">

<span class="reactions-react-button feed-shared-social-action-bar__action-button">
<!-- -->
<button aria-label="Gostar da publicação de Dextra Technologies" aria-pressed="false" class="react-button__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--4 artdeco-button--tertiary ember-view" id="ember997"><!-- -->
<span class="artdeco-button__text">
<div class="artdeco-button__text align-items-center">
<li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" type="like-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="24x24" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M19.46 11l-3.91-3.91a7 7 0 01-1.69-2.74l-.49-1.47A2.76 2.76 0 0010.76 1 2.75 2.75 0 008 3.74v1.12a9.19 9.19 0 00.46 2.85L8.89 9H4.12A2.12 2.12 0 002 11.12a2.16 2.16 0 00.92 1.76A2.11 2.11 0 002 14.62a2.14 2.14 0 001.28 2 2 2 0 00-.28 1 2.12 2.12 0 002 2.12v.14A2.12 2.12 0 007.12 22h7.49a8.08 8.08 0 003.58-.84l.31-.16H21V11zM19 19h-1l-.73.37a6.14 6.14 0 01-2.69.63H7.72a1 1 0 01-1-.72l-.25-.87-.85-.41A1 1 0 015 17l.17-1-.76-.74A1 1 0 014.27 14l.66-1.09-.73-1.1a.49.49 0 01.08-.7.48.48 0 01.34-.11h7.05l-1.31-3.92A7 7 0 0110 4.86V3.75a.77.77 0 01.75-.75.75.75 0 01.71.51L12 5a9 9 0 002.13 3.5l4.5 4.5H19z"></path>
</svg></li-icon>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember926" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember927" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember928"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Happy Three Kings’ Day! Will you be celebrating with Kings' Cake today? Share a photo with us if you do! If you are not in Mexico you may not know this, but a small figurine is hidden inside the cake while baking and the person who finds it in their slice is said to have good luck and should invite those present on February 2, the Candlemas Day, delicious tamales. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=threekingsday&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6752633587364835329">#ThreeKingsDay</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-1003="1003" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

<span class="reactions-react-button feed-shared-social-action-bar__action-button">

<span class="artdeco-button__text">

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Python was announced the <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=programming&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6751950378989846528">#Programming</a> Language of the year 2020 by TIOBE. The title is awarded to the programming language that has gained most popularity in 1 year. C++ was a very close runner up. <div class="display-flex">
<div class="display-flex flex-column flex-grow-1">
<div class="feed-shared-article__section">
<h2 class="feed-shared-article__title break-words t-14 t-bold t-black">
<span dir="ltr">5 IoT Trends To Watch In 2021</span>
</h2>
<h3 class="feed-shared-article__subtitle t-12 t-normal t-black--light">
                    forbes.com • 5 min de leitura
                  </h3>
</div>
<!-- --> </div>
<!-- --> </div>
</a>
</div>

</div></article>

<span class="reactions-react-button feed-shared-social-action-bar__action-button">

<span class="artdeco-button__text">
<div class="artdeco-button__text align-items-center">
<li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" type="like-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="24x24" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Did you miss the <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=appleevent&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6721906112142053376">#AppleEvent</a> today? Catch up: The latest iPhone is powered by the company’s new A14 Bionic processor, the first smartphone chip built on a 5nm process. <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=technews&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6721906112142053376">#TechNews</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=techtuesday&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6721906112142053376">#TechTuesday</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="http://ow.ly/XbeC50BRIes">http://ow.ly/XbeC50BRIes</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Microsoft Ignite's first half just wrapped up. Here's everything you need to know about the updates targeting their Azure cloud services:  <a data-attribute-index="2" href="http://ow.ly/wZol50BBKtV">http://ow.ly/wZol50BBKtV</a> <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cloud&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6715386922908307459">#Cloud</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=technews&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6715386922908307459">#TechNews</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">At Dextra Technologies working from home has been a joint effort. Transparency with our clients and team members has been critical. We achieve our goals through everybody's strong commitment, expertise and technology. We are miles apart, but still together. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=remoteworking&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6671826054987968512">#RemoteWorking</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=dextratech&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6671826054987968512">#DextraTech</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Did you watch today's <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=appleevent&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6711745415529697280">#AppleEvent</a> ? <span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">The choice of automation tools should not only meet your current needs but should also focus on potential trends and improvements. Take a look at different types of test <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=automation&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6707648701881454592">#automation</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=frameworks&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6707648701881454592">#frameworks</a>  and their benefits here: <a data-attribute-index="2" href="http://ow.ly/FCjX50BhcUL">http://ow.ly/FCjX50BhcUL</a></span></span>

<span><span dir="ltr">We came together virtually to celebrate employees who are distinguished by their commitment and loyalty to Dextra Technologies. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=dextraloyaltyleague&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6744343963802595328">#DextraLoyaltyLeague</a> Thank you all for your hard work! </span>

<span><span dir="ltr">Did you hear the news? AWS has opened 5G Wavelength Zones on Verizon’s 5G network, unlocking the power of <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=5g&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6699721248374562816">#5G</a> Edge and mobile edge compute for developers around the world. </span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">One of the things that impact an organization’s ability to be <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agile&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6725148768674578432">#Agile</a> is having the ability to make changes without the risk of breaking anything. Learn how to scale agile and improve <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=quality&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6725148768674578432">#quality</a> in this article. <a data-attribute-index="2" href="http://ow.ly/xTXv50C0bdY">http://ow.ly/xTXv50C0bdY</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

    Visualizar tradução
</span></button>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Join me as I host <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=sourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6658372777277472768">#Sourcing</a> Better <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=testing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6658372777277472768">#Testing</a> &amp;<br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=development&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6658372777277472768">#Development</a> Solutions in a Post COVID-19 World, as I speak to experts working w/ clients needing more <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=remotework&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6658372777277472768">#remotework</a> &amp; leveraging <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=automatedtesting&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6658372777277472768">#automatedtesting</a> of business applications<br/><a data-attribute-index="9" href="https://lnkd.in/dUaX5Mr">https://lnkd.in/dUaX5Mr</a> <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=automation&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6658372777277472768">#automation</a> <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6658372777277472768">#nearshore</a> <a data-attribute-index="7" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniCompany:5006659" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-institute-for-robotic-process-automation-irpa-/">The Institute for Robotic Process Automation &amp; Artificial Intelligence (IRPA AI)</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">For the 9th year in a row, Dextra Technologies has been recognized by <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniCompany:2012031" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/las-mejores-empresas-mexicanas/">Mejores Empresas Mexicanas</a> (MEM) as 1 of the Best Managed Companies in Mexico! </span>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember2571" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember2572" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember2573"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">According to a O’Reilly radar survey on the growth of <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cloud&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6671088793379991552">#cloud</a> computing, 52% say they use <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=microservices&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6671088793379991552">#microservices</a> concepts, tools, or methods for <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6671088793379991552">#software</a> development. Take a look at the current state of microservices: <a data-attribute-index="3" href="http://ow.ly/B6TK50zQt0a">http://ow.ly/B6TK50zQt0a</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-2589="2589" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

<span><span dir="ltr">Almost every enterprise now relies on <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=iot&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6668511087878529024">#IoT</a> devices in one form or another. According to Gartner, 21 billion connected “things” are at this moment performing all sorts of tasks. Learn more about this trend: <a data-attribute-index="2" href="http://ow.ly/ntvE50zFzVd">http://ow.ly/ntvE50zFzVd</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cloud&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6668511087878529024">#Cloud</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Google released Pigweed, a collection of open source libraries for developers who work on embedded devices. Learn more about it here: <a data-attribute-index="3" href="http://ow.ly/Ekov50yTogj">http://ow.ly/Ekov50yTogj</a> <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=embedded&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6648232134391795712">#Embedded</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6648232134391795712">#Software</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=opensource&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6648232134391795712">#OpenSource</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">A software architecture can ensure your software is flexible and scalable. Here are 5 reasons why you need to develop one even if your software has already been written. <a data-attribute-index="2" href="http://ow.ly/NCcU50yTmOI">http://ow.ly/NCcU50yTmOI</a> <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6653287749950455808">#Software</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=architecture&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6653287749950455808">#Architecture</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember3215" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember3216" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember3217"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">We would like to wish all our friends in Mexico a happy <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=mexicanindependenceday&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6712008430283984898">#MexicanIndependenceDay</a>! — Although often confused with Cinco de Mayo, Mexico’s Independence Day is actually today. <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=vivamexico&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6712008430283984898">#VivaMexico</a> What will you do on your day off? Let us know in the comments.</span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">October is <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=breastcancerawarenessmonth&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6717494550044135424">#BreastCancerAwarenessMonth</a> About 1 in 8 women will develop breast cancer over their lifetime. To help bring awareness, we are sharing with you these Free Educational Guides by the National Breast Cancer Foundation: <a data-attribute-index="1" href="http://bit.ly/OctEdGuide">http://bit.ly/OctEdGuide</a> Knowledge and early detection saves lives.</span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Commuting in the next 10 years is going to be a highly stimulating experience for passengers. Take a look at the future of the future of the <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=automotive&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6692187825208598529">#automotive</a> industry: <a data-attribute-index="1" href="http://ow.ly/tpBa50AFAcD">http://ow.ly/tpBa50AFAcD</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">The definition of an engineer is a person who uses science, math and creativity to solve technical problems. Happy Engineer’s Day to all our friends in Mexico celebrating today! <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=engineersday&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6684093747401232384">#EngineersDay</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Continental has announced the launch of a new 3D display that uses parallax barriers. The technology would need no cameras to detect head movement and would require no 3D glasses. Take a look at it: <a data-attribute-index="2" href="http://ow.ly/JGpr50yTpNT">http://ow.ly/JGpr50yTpNT</a> <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=automotive&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6648958003796025344">#Automotive</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=infotainment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6648958003796025344">#Infotainment</a></span></span>
</span>

<section class="artdeco-card ember-view" id="ember125"><!-- -->
